frontmatter.description: Much has been lost in terms of quality of life. This cannot become the new standard. Strive for even better than before.
frontmatter.title: Quality of life loss normalization

frontmatter.description: Everyone is consumed by more than what's on the surface. Every interaction in influenced by any number of unknown past experiences.
frontmatter.title: Mindfully rational

frontmatter.description: There's too many similarities and there's a sense of normalcy to the current problems. What's entirely missing is a united effort to defeat these challenges. Like 9/11, this is a time to work for the betterment of entire communities, not individuals.
frontmatter.title: Unity in smoky conditions

frontmatter.description: It's devastating to see and unlikely to change. The drought cycles continue, people keep spreading to rural areas, and the kindling is set for fires to spread.
frontmatter.title: Fire and smoke

frontmatter.description: Be proactive about dictating direction of days. Don't wait for news from others to determine next steps.
frontmatter.title: Dictate direction, avoid anxiety

frontmatter.description: The best-laid plans of mice and men often go awry. Progress is rarely a straight line. Overcome the setbacks.
frontmatter.title: Progress is rarely a straight line

frontmatter.description: Make things better. The world will not call upon the unseen potential. Find new stories.
frontmatter.title: Approach with development perspective

frontmatter.description: Division is the easy way. Go beyond, find commonalities, build new connections.
frontmatter.title: Identify common feelings

frontmatter.description: Don't try to squeeze productivity in. Use time with family well, choose how to spend time, and act deliberately.
frontmatter.title: Accept reality, act deliberately

frontmatter.description: When forced to rebuild work, take time to improve the next time around. Strengthen the weaknesses that lead to the problems first, and look for additional opportunities next. Use the insight gained to build with new ideas in mind. It's a frustrating process and there's no point in doing it again if it will lead to further problems.
frontmatter.title: Rebuild stronger
